tests.smartapp.testutil
=======================

.. py:module:: tests.smartapp.testutil

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Unit test utilities.





Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: load_file(path: pathlib.Path) -> str

   Load text of a single file as a string.


.. py:function:: load_dir(path: pathlib.Path) -> dict[str, str]

   Load text of all files in a directory into a dict.
